trans-unit.source: Set Alerts in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Set Alerts in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: Get emails about crashes, exceptions, metric changes.
trans-unit.target: Get emails about crashes, exceptions, metric changes.

trans-unit.source: Set Alerts in Application Insights
trans-unit.target: Set Alerts in Application Insights

trans-unit.source: [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] can alert you to changes in performance or usage metrics in your app.
trans-unit.target: [Visual Studio Application Insights][start] can alert you to changes in performance or usage metrics in your app.

trans-unit.source: Application Insights monitors your live app on a [wide variety of platforms][platforms] to help you diagnose performance issues and understand usage patterns.
trans-unit.target: Application Insights monitors your live app on a [wide variety of platforms][platforms] to help you diagnose performance issues and understand usage patterns.

trans-unit.source: There are two kinds of alerts:
trans-unit.target: There are two kinds of alerts:

trans-unit.source: **Web tests** tell you when your site is unavailable on the internet, or responding slowly.
trans-unit.target: **Web tests** tell you when your site is unavailable on the internet, or responding slowly.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more][availability].
trans-unit.target: [Learn more][availability].

trans-unit.source: **Metric alerts** tell you when any metric crosses a threshold value for some period - such as failure counts, memory, or page views.
trans-unit.target: **Metric alerts** tell you when any metric crosses a threshold value for some period - such as failure counts, memory, or page views.

trans-unit.source: There's a [separate page about web tests][availability], so we'll focus on metric alerts here.
trans-unit.target: There's a [separate page about web tests][availability], so we'll focus on metric alerts here.

trans-unit.source: Metric alerts
trans-unit.target: Metric alerts

trans-unit.source: If you haven't set up Application Insights for your app, [do that first][start].
trans-unit.target: If you haven't set up Application Insights for your app, [do that first][start].

trans-unit.source: To get an email when a metric crosses a threshold, start either from Metrics Explorer, or from the Alert rules tile on the overview blade.
trans-unit.target: To get an email when a metric crosses a threshold, start either from Metrics Explorer, or from the Alert rules tile on the overview blade.

trans-unit.source: In the Alert rules blade, choose Add Alert.
trans-unit.target: In the Alert rules blade, choose Add Alert.

trans-unit.source: Set the your app as the resource to measure, provide a name for the alert, and choose a metric.
trans-unit.target: Set the your app as the resource to measure, provide a name for the alert, and choose a metric.

trans-unit.source: Set the resource before the other properties.
trans-unit.target: Set the resource before the other properties.

trans-unit.source: **Choose the "(components)" resource** if you want to set alerts on performance or usage metrics.
trans-unit.target: **Choose the "(components)" resource** if you want to set alerts on performance or usage metrics.

trans-unit.source: Be careful to note the units in which you're asked to enter the threshold value.
trans-unit.target: Be careful to note the units in which you're asked to enter the threshold value.

trans-unit.source: I don't see the Add Alert button.
trans-unit.target: I don't see the Add Alert button.

trans-unit.source: - Are you using an organizational account?
trans-unit.target: - Are you using an organizational account?

trans-unit.source: You can set alerts if you have owner or contributor access to this application resource.
trans-unit.target: You can set alerts if you have owner or contributor access to this application resource.

trans-unit.source: Take a look at Settings -> Users.
trans-unit.target: Take a look at Settings -> Users.

trans-unit.source: [Learn about access control][roles].
trans-unit.target: [Learn about access control][roles].

trans-unit.source: See your alerts
trans-unit.target: See your alerts

trans-unit.source: You get an email when an alert changes state between inactive and active.
trans-unit.target: You get an email when an alert changes state between inactive and active.

trans-unit.source: The current state of each alert is shown in the Alert rules blade.
trans-unit.target: The current state of each alert is shown in the Alert rules blade.

trans-unit.source: The history of state changes is in the Operations Events log:
trans-unit.target: The history of state changes is in the Operations Events log:

trans-unit.source: On the Overview blade, near the bottom, click 'Events in the past week'
trans-unit.target: On the Overview blade, near the bottom, click 'Events in the past week'

trans-unit.source: Are these "events" related to telemetry events or custom events?
trans-unit.target: Are these "events" related to telemetry events or custom events?

trans-unit.source: No.
trans-unit.target: No.

trans-unit.source: These operational events are just a log of things that have happened to this application resource.
trans-unit.target: These operational events are just a log of things that have happened to this application resource.

trans-unit.source: Availability alerts
trans-unit.target: Availability alerts

trans-unit.source: You can set up web tests that test any web site from points around the world.
trans-unit.target: You can set up web tests that test any web site from points around the world.

trans-unit.source: [Learn more][availability].
trans-unit.target: [Learn more][availability].

trans-unit.source: What are good alerts to set?
trans-unit.target: What are good alerts to set?

trans-unit.source: It depends on your application.
trans-unit.target: It depends on your application.

trans-unit.source: To start with, it's best not to set too many metrics.
trans-unit.target: To start with, it's best not to set too many metrics.

trans-unit.source: Spend some time looking at your metric charts while your app is running, to get a feel for how it behaves normally.
trans-unit.target: Spend some time looking at your metric charts while your app is running, to get a feel for how it behaves normally.

trans-unit.source: This will help you find ways to improve its performance.
trans-unit.target: This will help you find ways to improve its performance.

trans-unit.source: Then set up alerts to tell you when the metrics go outside the normal zone.
trans-unit.target: Then set up alerts to tell you when the metrics go outside the normal zone.

trans-unit.source: Popular alerts include:
trans-unit.target: Popular alerts include:

trans-unit.source: [Web tests][availability] are important if your application is a website or web service that is visible on the public internet.
trans-unit.target: [Web tests][availability] are important if your application is a website or web service that is visible on the public internet.

trans-unit.source: They tell you if your site goes down or responds slowly - even if it's the carrier's problem rather than your app.
trans-unit.target: They tell you if your site goes down or responds slowly - even if it's the carrier's problem rather than your app.

trans-unit.source: But they're synthetic tests, so they don't measure your users' actual experience.
trans-unit.target: But they're synthetic tests, so they don't measure your users' actual experience.

trans-unit.source: [Browser metrics][client], especially Browser page load times, are good for web applications.
trans-unit.target: [Browser metrics][client], especially Browser page load times, are good for web applications.

trans-unit.source: If your page has a lot of scripts, you'll want to look out for browser exceptions.
trans-unit.target: If your page has a lot of scripts, you'll want to look out for browser exceptions.

trans-unit.source: In order to get these metrics and alerts, you have to set up [web page monitoring][client].
trans-unit.target: In order to get these metrics and alerts, you have to set up [web page monitoring][client].

trans-unit.source: Server response time and Failed requests for the server side of web applications.
trans-unit.target: Server response time and Failed requests for the server side of web applications.

trans-unit.source: As well as setting up alerts, keep an eye on these metrics to see if they vary disproportionately with high request rates: that might indicate that your app is running out of resources.
trans-unit.target: As well as setting up alerts, keep an eye on these metrics to see if they vary disproportionately with high request rates: that might indicate that your app is running out of resources.

trans-unit.source: test
trans-unit.target: test
